Title: Between Two Ferns: The Movie
Writer: Scott Aukerman (screenplay by), Zach Galifianakis (story by), Scott Aukerman (story by)
Actors: Zach Galifianakis, Matthew McConaughey, Rekha Shankar, Olivia Mekdara
Plot: Zach Galifianakis and his oddball crew take a road trip to complete a series of high-profile celebrity interviews.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.
